column5: This listing is for HORSES or ranch friendly livestock. Owner is responsible for all risk and expenses involved with animal care. However, the field can be rented out for other purposes. Just watch your step...  6 large livestock animals is the suggested limit. Weekly and monthly discounts apply! For long-term boarding for smaller animals or deer, please contact me as some fence modifications may apply.
column8: Pasture Boarding East Field - Everfree Shire Ranch
